title: Pablo Oeffner Ferreira
summary: Student at Altes Gymnasium Bremen (10th grade). Autodidact. Developer of ASH (A Science Hub). Loves natural sciences, sports, jogging, and outdoor adventure.

body.name: Pablo Oeffner Ferreira

school.name: Altes Gymnasium Bremen

self_description: Autodidact, learns by building and experimenting.
Created ASH both as a personal learning platform and a large scientific toolkit.

projects.name: ASH – A Science Hub
projects.overview: Local science suite with more than 100 tools and multiple 'Labs'. GUIs are minimalistic; main focus is on quick inputs and later visualizations.
highlights: Labs: Element Lab, Molecule Library, Mechanics Lab, DNA Lab, Electricity & Magnetism Lab, Geo Lab, Microbiology Lab
Interactive 3D viewers: Molecules, AlphaFold, Terminal Velocity 3D
Covers wide areas: astronomy, biology, chemistry, electricity, geology, math, mechanics, optics, waves

communication_guidelines.language: English for tools; concise style when explaining.
style: Do not suggest what was not asked – answer only.
Be truthful, precise, and slightly critical.
